The secondary objective study evaluate significance different diastereoisomers penicilloate skin test reactivity .
DOC.brief_title: Equivalency Penicilloate Skin Test Reactivity Prepared Modified Alkaline Hydrolysis Technique
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study evaluate equivalency skin test reactivity penicilloate prepare new method penicilloate preparation versus old method penicilloate preparation . The secondary objective study evaluate significance different diastereoisomers penicilloate skin test reactivity . Five ( 5 ) adult subject without history penicillin allergy fifteen ( 15 ) adult subject history penicillin allergy previous positive penicillin skin test minor determinant ( penicilloate ) and/or major determinant ( penicilloyl ) enrol study . Each subject skin test current penicillin skin test include penicilloate conduct Division Allergic Diseases compare skin test penicilloate prepare new method along different diastereoisomers penicilloic acid day time . The adult subject without history penicillin allergy serve control .
DOC.criteria: 1 . History penicillin allergy 2 . Previous current positive skin test penicilloate 3 . Greater equal 18 year age 1 . Uncontrolled asthma symptom 2 . Patients receive penicillin adverse drug reaction 3 . Previous adverse reaction penicillin skin test 4 . Dermatological condition may interfere skin test i.e . atopic dermatitis dermatographism 5 . Medication may interfere skin test i.e . antidepressant , antihistamine , sedative .
